jobs_results.title: Mobile Developer Trainee
jobs_results.company_name: 607 Stora Enso Wood Products Zdirec s.r.o.
jobs_results.description: Mobile Developer Trainee (Part-time Trainee Position) Stora Enso is a leading provider of renewable products in packaging, biomaterials, and wooden construction, and one of the largest private forest owners in the world. At Stora Enso, we believe that everything made from fossil-based materials today can be made from a tree tomorrow. We employ approximately 20,000 people globally. Career for a better climate. Every day. Are you passionate about mobile development? Would you like to gain valuable hands-on experience while pursuing your studies? Are you available to work 20 hours per week until August 2026? We are seeking a motivated Flutter (Dart) or Android Mobile Developer Trainee to join our innovative IT and development team in the Forest Division. In this role, you will contribute to building modern mobile applications that empower our organization and customers, helping drive forward our mission of sustainability and digital innovation. You will be located in our office - Organica in Ostrava, Czechia. Key Responsibilities: Mobile App Development: Assist in developing and maintaining Flutter (Dart) mobile applications, focusing on both Android and iOS compatibility. UI/UX Implementation: Help design and implement intuitive, user-friendly interfaces that enhance customer and employee experiences. Bug Fixing and Optimization: Identify and resolve issues in existing mobile applications, ensuring performance and stability. API Integration: Collaborate with backend developers to integrate REST APIs and ensure seamless data communication between apps and server systems. Documentation: Maintain detailed technical documentation to support project workflows and future development. Collaboration: Work closely with senior developers, project managers, and other stakeholders to align app development with business goals. Qualifications Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, IT, or a related field. Basic understanding of mobile app development using Flutter (Dart) or experience with Android development. Familiarity with version control tools like Git. Knowledge of REST APIs and app lifecycle management is a plus. Experience with Firebase or other backend services is a bonus. A passion for mobile app development, problem-solving, and attention to detail. Good communication skills and proficiency in English for collaboration with global teams. What We Offer By joining us, you will become part of a diverse, forward-thinking culture where you‚Äôll gain hands-on experience in mobile development while contributing to a more sustainable future. Your work will support Stora Enso‚Äôs mission to lead the way in sustainable innovation. We also care deeply about your wellbeing, offering resources to help you thrive both physically and mentally. Role specific opportunities/things that we offer: modern office in Ostrava - we apply hybrid model 5 weeks of vacation per year lunch cards 160 CZK commuting allowance cafeteria pension insurance annual bonus How to Apply Submit your application through our recruitment portal. Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so we encourage you to apply as soon as possible, but no later than 26 January 2025. Our recruitment process may include video interviews, aptitude tests, and pre-employment checks such as reference, background, and health assessments, as well as a drug test. jobs_results.title: iOS Mobile Developer with Android  @ Altimetrik Poland
jobs_results.description:
If you possess...
‚Ä¢ Strong proficiency in Swift and Objective-C, as well as experience with iOS frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of Android development fundamentals and familiarity with Kotlin/Java is a strong plus.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with RESTful APIs and third-party libraries.
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of mobile application architecture, cross-platform development principles, and mobile performance optimization.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills, with the ability to clearly convey technical details and collaborate effectively with developers of varying experience levels.
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with mobile app deployment pipelines and CI/CD practices for iOS.
‚Ä¢ Experience in Kotlin Multiplatform (KMP) or similar cross-platform frameworks.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of mobile testing frameworks and experience with both manual and automated testing practices.
‚Ä¢ Experience with mobile security practices and secure storage (Keychain/Keystore).

Altimetrik Poland is a digital enablement company. We deliver bite-size outcomes to enterprises and startups from all industries in an agile way to help them scale and accelerate their businesses. We are unique in Poland's IT market. Our differentiators are an innovation-first approach, a strong focus on core development, and an ability to attack the challenging and complex problems of the biggest companies in the world.

We seek an experienced Senior iOS Developer with in-depth knowledge of iOS app development and some understanding of Android. Previous work experience with scalable mobile applications and can navigate both iOS and Android environments.

We work 100% remotely or from our hub in Krak√≥w.

üî•We grow fast.

ü§ìWe learn a lot.

ü§πWe prefer to do things instead of just talking about them.

If you would like to work in an environment that values trust and empowerment... don't hesitate, just apply
,[Design, develop, and maintain advanced iOS background applications., Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Android developers, to design and launch new features., Review, test, and debug iOS applications, ensuring top performance and responsiveness., Provide architectural guidance and help establish best practices for both iOS and Android mobile development., Optimize code for performance, quality, and reusability across iOS and, where relevant, Android platforms., Assist with cross-platform integration, including shared data, APIs, and libraries, to support consistent functionality across both iOS and Android.] Requirements: iOS, Android, Swift, REST API, CI/CD, Kotlin, Java, Objective-C Tools: . Additionally: Private healthcare, Small teams, International projects, Modern office, Startup atmosphere, No dress code.

jobs_results.title: Android Mobile Software Engineer
jobs_results.description:
Mobile Software Engineer (Android)

As part of the Store-in-store team, you will be working on an innovative product that aims to create a dedicated place for brands and retailers within the broader Allegro platform in multiple countries. We are part of the Allegro Group, which ranks among the ten most visited e-commerce websites in the world. Development teams at Allegro consist of more than 1,700 IT specialists. We are now looking for talented Android Mobile app developer (mid) for permanent employment to join our team and help accelerate the growth of our solution.

Who are we?

‚Ä¢ We aim to create a dedicated place for brands and retailers within the Allegro platform in several countries
‚Ä¢ We create components for customers, as well as tools for administrators representing brands and retailers
‚Ä¢ Our daily challenge is solving complex customer problems on a large-scale technological platform
‚Ä¢ Our product involves several closely collaborating teams based in Prague and Brno
‚Ä¢ Each team consists of a Product Manager, Front-end and Back-end developers, QA engineer and a UX designer
‚Ä¢ We work in agile methodology - Kanban
‚Ä¢ We constantly improve processes and introduce new technologies
‚Ä¢ We meet 1-2 times a week in the office, go out for lunch, or have a team breakfast together (we do not want to see each other only on Zoom, but we also do not need to be in the office every day)
‚Ä¢ Occasionally we collaborate with colleagues from Poland, documenting in English, but internal team communication is in Czech
‚Ä¢ We are looking for a new colleague who would help us speed-up our mobile app development as a dedicated Mobile Software Engineer

Who are you?:

‚Ä¢ Understand the app development process, from design to App Store release
‚Ä¢ Android:

‚Ä¢ Know Android SDK inside out, both from the user's and developer's perspective
‚Ä¢ Understand what‚Äôs under the hood of Gradle build process
‚Ä¢ Are fluent in Kotlin. Our codebase is 100% migrated to Kotlin
‚Ä¢ Are proficient in Android Studio and have experience in using version control systems
‚Ä¢ Have hands-on experience with object-oriented programming, algorithms, and data structures
‚Ä¢ Have experience in maintaining Continuous Integration environments
‚Ä¢ Like to work with technologies that go beyond the mobile stack
‚Ä¢ Have strong communication skills to effectively collaborate with teams both online and offline and resolve issues promptly
‚Ä¢ Have excellent debugging skills to troubleshoot and find creative solutions when faced with technical challenges
‚Ä¢ Are hands-on and problem-solving oriented
‚Ä¢ Can search for efficient solutions to meet users‚Äô requirements
‚Ä¢ Are eager to continuously develop their skills and update their knowledge
‚Ä¢ You know Czech and English (at B2 level minimum)
‚Ä¢ You can meet us at least once a week in the office in Prague Hole≈°ovice

What do we offer?

‚Ä¢ English classes that we pay for related to the specific nature of your job
‚Ä¢ Co-financing of meals, sports card and additional days off for volunteer work
‚Ä¢ Our office in Hole≈°ovice is dog-friendly
‚Ä¢ We will be happy to hear your ideas and even happier to hear your jokes
‚Ä¢ We will give you the space to try new things
‚Ä¢ We work in small, but effective teams - corporate jungle won't stop us
‚Ä¢ We organize hackathons and other team events
‚Ä¢ You can join our team tourism
‚Ä¢ We have our own learning platform, but we also have a budget for education and conferences. Our experienced colleagues will also help you with your development
‚Ä¢ Once you use up your 20 days of vacation, you can take an additional 5 relax days, and if you are not feeling well, there are 3 sick days available
‚Ä¢ If you want to learn more about the benefits, check it out

If you are interested, please send your CV in English. The recruitment process is conducted fully in English (there will be an additional, short 5 minute phone call in Czech if it is not your native language).

jobs_results.title: High-Performance React Native Developer for iOS Applications
jobs_results.description:
At EV Infinity, we're seeking a seasoned React Native Developer with expertise in Swift and iOS development to join our innovative technology team. As a key member of our team, you'll be responsible for designing and developing high-performance cross-platform mobile applications using React Native.
About the Role

We're looking for a talented developer who can implement native iOS features and optimizations using Swift, create efficient, scalable, and maintainable code for mobile applications, and collaborate with product managers, designers, and backend developers to deliver exceptional mobile experiences.
Requirements
‚Ä¢ 4+ years of experience in mobile application development
‚Ä¢ Strong expertise in React Native
‚Ä¢ Proficient in Swift and iOS native development
‚Ä¢ Solid understanding of mobile app architecture and design patterns
‚Ä¢ Experience with state management libraries (Redux, MobX, or Context API)
‚Ä¢ Familiarity with RESTful APIs and GraphQL
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in TypeScript
‚Ä¢ Understanding of iOS UI/UX guidelines
‚Ä¢ Experience with mobile app testing and deployment
Key Skills
‚Ä¢ React Native
‚Ä¢ Swift
‚Ä¢ TypeScript
‚Ä¢ iOS SDK
‚Ä¢ Xcode
‚Ä¢ CocoaPods
‚Ä¢ Redux/MobX
‚Ä¢ RESTful APIs
‚Ä¢ GraphQL
‚Ä¢ Firebase/Cloud Services
‚Ä¢ Git version control
Salary and Benefits

We offer a competitive salary range of ¬£80,000 - ¬£110,000 per annum, depending on experience, plus benefits including a generous pension scheme, flexible working hours, and opportunities for professional growth and development.

$106,900 USD per annum estimated based on London location
